shortBio: Luxury sculptural candles and clean home decor pieces handcrafted in Lagos for men and  women who love statement interiors.

policies.returns: Because our pieces are handmade, we accept returns only for items received damaged. Contact us within 24 hours of delivery with photos.
policies.care: Keep away from direct heat/sunlight. Trim wick to 5mm. Place candles on a heat-safe tray.
